The Orphan Trains of Nebraska

Joseph Kraich

  1. Foster Name: Unknown
  2. Foster Family: Charles L. and Lova Cloud Unterkircher
  3. Location of Family: Tecumseh, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Children's Aid Society
  5. Arrival Place: Tecumseh, NE
  6. Age on Arrival: 11
  7. Date of Birth: 1/29/1903, Brooklyn, NY
  8. Date of Death: 11/9/1917, Elk Creek, NE
  9. Gender: male
  10. Notes: Died after being kicked by a colt on farm of foster family.
  11. Source: Mary Ellen Johnson, comp., Orphan Train Riders: Their Own Stories Vol. 4 (Baltimore: Gateway Press, 1992), p. 235-242; Tecumseh Chieftain, 17 October 1914; Find-A-Grave for Joseph Kraich.
